channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: BA.5: good as clickbait, not so good at causing a massive spike of infections among the already vaccinated, boosted, infected, and/or dead. So if and when a proper scary strain comes, the usual wolf criers will be all out of capital letters and red alert emoji. https://t.co/nWQjh063R0
